help.title: üî® Ban
help.description: Use this command to ban a member from your server, `{prefix}ban <@member/id> [reason]`

ban.success: {member}[{memberName} - {memberId}] has been banned from the server! Reason: `{reason}`
ban.error: Something went wrong while changing the language of this server, please try again later.
ban.notMember: This member does not exist, try mentioning or typing correctly.
ban.notAdmin: This member cannot be banned because they are a mod/admin or their role is higher than mine.

help.title: üî† Language
help.description: Change the language of {botName} in relation to the server with the command `{prefix}language <pt-br/en-us/es>`.

language.success: The language of this server has been set to: `{language}`
language.error: Something went wrong when changing the language of this server, please try again later.
language.notLanguage: The language {language} does not exist, the only existing languages are: `pt-br`, `en-us`, `es`.

help.title: üí† Prefix
help.description: Change the prefix of {botName} in relation to the server with the command `{prefix}prefix <prefix>`.

prefix.success: The prefix of this server has been set to: `{prefix}`
prefix.error: Something went wrong when changing the language of this server, please try again later.
prefix.maxLength: The prefix can only have a maximum of 8 characters.

interaction.error2: An error occurred while executing this command!
interaction.ownerWarn: Whoa there, {member}, hold on! This command is only for very special and trusted individuals. You are not allowed to execute this command.

moduleController.errorCommands: ‚ùå An error occurred while loading the commands.

permissions.Manager_Guild: You do not have permission to use this command, only those with the `Manage Server` permission.
permissions.Member_Ban: You do not have permission to use this command, only those with the `Ban Members` permission.
